text: Black Stone Cherry are a rock band from Kentucky, USA. They are signed to Roadrunner Records and have released two albums, called Black Stone Cherry and Folklore and Superstition. The band has had several songs reach the top 30 of Billboard's Top Mainstream Rock Songs, including "Lonely Train", which reached #14 on that chart in 2006. ==Members of the band== *Chris Robertson (lead vocals, guitar) *Ben Wells (guitar, backing vocals) *Jon Lawhon (bass guitar, backing vocals) *John Fred Young (drums, backing vocals) ==References== ==Other websites== *Black Stone Cherry's official website Category:Roadrunner Records Category:American hard rock bands Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Post-grunge bands Category:Southern rock bands Category:Entertainers from Kentucky
title: Black Stone Cherry
